mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.username AS username,A.password AS password,A.nick_name AS nickName,A.real_name AS realName,A.is_real_auth AS isRealAuth,A.is_new AS isNew,A.sex AS sex,A.phone AS phone,A.login_name AS loginName,A.tel AS tel,A.phone_conceal AS phoneConceal,A.email AS email,A.avatar AS avatar,A.pic_path AS picPath,A.pic_paths AS picPaths,A.contact_way AS contactWay,A.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime,A.last_login_ip AS lastLoginIp,A.address AS address,A.province AS province,A.city AS city,A.weixin AS weixin,A.qq AS qq,A.weibo AS weibo,A.job_id AS jobId,A.job_code AS jobCode,A.birthday AS birthday,A.title_code AS titleCode,A.qr_code AS qrCode,A.qr_code2 AS qrCode2,A.third_name AS thirdName,A.third_id AS thirdId,A.third_password AS thirdPassword,A.wx_openid AS wxOpenid,A.role_id AS roleId,A.organization AS organization,A.idcard_num AS idcardNum,A.certificate_type AS certificateType,A.certificate_number AS certificateNumber,A.certificate_name AS certificateName,A.description AS description,A.link_id2 AS linkId2,A.link_id3 AS linkId3,A.link_id4 AS linkId4,A.link_id5 AS linkId5,A.link_code AS linkCode,A.link_code2 AS linkCode2,A.link_code3 AS linkCode3,A.link_code4 AS linkCode4,A.link_code5 AS linkCode5,A.link_str AS linkStr,A.param_json AS paramJson,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_str3 AS attrStr3,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

, ( SELECT count(*) FROM fans f WHERE f.fans_id = A.id ) AS FansCount, ( SELECT count(*) FROM fans f WHERE f.user_id = A.id ) AS focusCount ,uf.frozen_money AS frozenMoney,uf.avaliable_money AS avaliableMoney, uf.other_fund AS otherFund, uf.integral_fund AS integralFund ,pca.area_name AS cityName,pca1.area_name AS provinceName
LEFT JOIN user_fund uf ON uf.user_id = A.id LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca ON pca.id = A.city LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca1 ON pca1.id = A.province
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
